index.title: Привіт, я Саболч, веб-розробник і розробник програмного забезпечення.
index.subtitle: Backend / Frontend / Web Apps

text: Hi there, my name is Sabolch Vargha and I work freelance in Uzghorod, Ukraine. I am a Web Developer and I specialize in creating websites. For the past 2 years, I've been developing applications for the web using mostly PHP. I do this for a living and love what I do as every day there is something new and exciting to learn.
Coding have been my passion since the days I started working with computers but I found myself into programing since 2014. I enjoy creating beautifully designed, intuitive and functional websites.
